google_google_service_account.description: Allows management of a Google Cloud Platform service account.

account_id.description: The account id that is used to generate the service

display_name.description: The display name for the service account.

description.description: A text description of the service account.

project.description: The ID of the project that the service account will be created in.

email.description: The e-mail address of the service account. This value

name.description: The fully-qualified name of the service account.

unique_id.description: The unique id of the service account.
